product_name: adidas Terrex Fast X Low GTX Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: adidas Terrex Fast X Low GTX hiking shoes are built for fast hikes in inclement weather thanks to lightweight, protective synthetic and mesh uppers lined with waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex(R). adidas Outdoor FORMOTION(R) footwear is designed for enhanced motion control and downhill comfort. High-abrasion mesh and synthetic leather uppers offer breathability and durability; waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex/nylon linings keep feet dry. Speed lacing construction for fast and snug lacing. EVA midsoles cushion each step; polyamide protection plates protect feet from uneven trail debris. TRAXION(TM) outsoles provide an amazing grip and agility during fast activities; Continental(TM) rubber gives you optimal grip in wet conditions.
short_description: adidas Terrex Fast X Low GTX hiking shoes are built for fast hikes in inclement weather thanks to lightweight, protective synthetic and mesh uppers lined with waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex(R).
